Subsection.Text: The council shall, by rule, establish fees for the described purposes and within the ranges specified in this section:

Paragraph.Text: Application fee: not less than $25, or more than $50.
Examination fee: not less than $25, or more than $100.
Initial license fee: not less than $25, or more than $100.
Renewal of license fee: not less than $25, or more than $100.
Delinquent license fee: not less than $25, or more than $50.
Inactive license fee: not less than $10, or more than $25.

Subsection.Text: Until the council adopts rules establishing fees under subsection (1), the lower amount in each range shall apply.
Fees collected under this section shall be deposited to the credit of the Professional Regulation Trust Fund.

The council shall establish fees that are adequate to fund the cost to implement the provisions of this part. Fees shall be based on the department estimates of the revenue required to implement this part and the provisions of law with respect to the regulation of community association managers.
